item.title: Twitterの従業員へのメモで、CEOのリンダ・ヤッカリーノは、このプラットフォームは「世界で最も正確なリアルタイム情報源になることを使命としている」と述べた（Alexa Corse/Wall Street Journal）。
item.description:
Alexa Corse / Wall Street Journal:
In a memo to Twitter employees, CEO Linda Yaccarino said the platform is “on a mission to become the world's most accurate real-time information source”  —  Linda Yaccarino, who joined company last week, describes her mission to employees  —  Twitter's new chief executive told employees …

item.title: 毎月10万部以上印刷され、英国の極右やドイツの陰謀論販売店とつながりのある英国の陰謀論新聞「The Light」を見てみる（Marianna Spring/BBC）
item.description:
Marianna Spring / BBC:
A look at UK conspiracy theory newspaper The Light, which prints 100K+ copies per month and has links with the British far-right and a German conspiracy outlet  —  A UK conspiracy theory newspaper sharing calls for trials and executions of politicians and doctors has links with the British far-right …

item.title: ウクライナでBBCのために働いていたときに負傷したドキュメンタリー作家が補償を求め、戦地でのフリーランサーに対するBBCの保険の取り決めを批判している（Jake Kanter/Deadline)
item.description:
Jake Kanter / Deadline:
A documentary maker injured while working for the BBC in Ukraine seeks compensation and criticizes the BBC's insurance arrangements for freelancers in war zones  —  EXCLUSIVE: A documentary maker involved in a car accident in Ukraine with presenter Clive Myrie has commenced legal action …

item.title: 食べて、祈って、恋をして』の著者エリザベス・ギルバートが、ウクライナの読者からの反発を受け、1930年代のロシアを舞台にした新刊を無期限延期し、さまざまな反応が見られる（New York Times）。
item.description:
New York Times:
Eat, Pray, Love author Elizabeth Gilbert indefinitely delays her new book set in 1930s Russia after a backlash from Ukrainian readers, prompting mixed reactions  —  Elizabeth Gilbert delayed her new novel indefinitely after an online backlash condemned the book's publication while Russia is at war with Ukraine.

item.title: GoogleのSearch Generative Experienceは、様々なサイトのテキストのスニペットを、しばしば一字一句違わずつなぎ合わせる「AI盗作エンジン」のようだ（Avram Piltch/Tom's Hardware）。
item.description:
Avram Piltch / Tom's Hardware:
Google's Search Generative Experience seems like an “AI plagiarism engine” that cobbles together snippets of text from a variety of sites, often word-for-word  —  The Search Generative Experience seems more like a text-copying experience.  —  Search has always been the Internet's most important utility.

item.title: アイダ・B・ウェルズ協会は、UNCチャペルヒルが同協会の資金を新拠点に移すのに手間取り、若手ジャーナリスト向けの2023年サマープログラムを中止した（Joe Killian/NC Newsline）。
item.description:
Joe Killian / NC Newsline:
The Ida B. Wells Society canceled its 2023 summer programs for young journalists, after the UNC-Chapel Hill lagged in moving the society's funds to its new home  —  The Ida B. Wells Society for Investigative Reporting was housed at UNC-Chapel Hill's Carroll Hall.

item.title: テック系ニュースサイト「dot.LA」が編集スタッフ7人全員をレイオフ、メモ：サム・アダムスCEOは「AI分野の新ベンチャーに集中する」ために退任する（Sharon Knolle/The Wrap）。
item.description:
Sharon Knolle / The Wrap:
Tech news site dot.LA laid off all seven of its editorial staff; memo: CEO Sam Adams is stepping back to “focus on a new venture in the AI space”  —  The company is “refining our editorial focus to better serve our readers,” says cofounder Sam Adams

item.title: ワシントン・ポスト紙の暫定CEOパティ・ストーンズィファーのプロフィール。元マイクロソフトの幹部で、ニュース会社を率いたことがなく、自分の役割は一時的なものだと主張している（ワシントン・ポスト）。
item.description:
Washington Post:
A profile of The Washington Post's interim CEO Patty Stonesifer, a former Microsoft executive who has never led a news company and insists her role is temporary  —  Stonesifer ran the Gates Foundation for many years after several successful years at Microsoft.

item.title: Wheel of Fortune」の司会を40年間務めたPat Sajak氏は、9月に始まるゲーム番組の41シーズン終了後の2024年に引退する予定だ（Lucas Shaw/Bloomberg)
item.description:
Lucas Shaw / Bloomberg:
Pat Sajak, the host of Wheel of Fortune for 40 years, plans to retire in 2024 after the game show's 41st season which begins in September  —  Pat Sajak, who has hosted the hit game show Wheel of Fortune since Ronald Reagan was president, will retire next year.

item.title: 情報筋の話：Netflixが今秋、初のスポーツイベントのライブストリーミングを行うべく交渉中、プロゴルファーやF1ドライバーによるセレブリティゴルフトーナメント（Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
Sources: Netflix is in talks to livestream its first sporting event this fall, a celebrity golf tournament with professional golfers and Formula One drivers  —  Tournament would feature celebrities from Formula One series ‘Drive to Survive’ and golf program ‘Full Swing’

item.title: 英語を話せない移民のために、YouTuberが情報の空白を埋めている。Newsmaxなどの極右雑誌をベトナム語に翻訳している人もいる（Lam Thuy Vo/The Markup）
item.description:
Lam Thuy Vo / The Markup:
How YouTubers are filling information voids for immigrants who don't speak English, including one who translates far-right outlets like Newsmax into Vietnamese  —  How one Vietnamese community depends on YouTube for news, and what that tells us about the unmet needs of immigrant enclaves

item.title: CNNの次期CEOが直面する構造的・経営的課題、視聴率低迷やマイクロマネジメントなど、WBD CEO David Zaslavによる考察（Jeremy Barr／Washington Post）。
item.description:
Jeremy Barr / Washington Post:
A look at the structural and management challenges facing the next CEO of CNN, including slumping ratings and micromanagement by WBD CEO David Zaslav  —  Even beyond the fired CEO's programming blunders, the cable-news giant is facing industry-wide challenges and corporate hurdles that could make it a hard role to fill.

item.title: MrBeastことJimmy Donaldsonが、利他的な行為や、時には文字通り慈善行為として加入するピッチングなど、その不条理な行為でバイラルセンセーションを起こした理由（Max Read/New York Times)
item.description:
Max Read / New York Times:
How Jimmy Donaldson, aka MrBeast, became a viral sensation for his absurd acts of altruism and pitching subscribing as an act of charity, sometimes literally  —  Jimmy Donaldson, a.k.a. MrBeast, has become a viral sensation for his absurd acts of altruism.  Why do so many people think he's evil?

item.title: Amazon、現在280以上のチャンネルを持つFreeveeにWBDとMGMのFASTチャンネル23本を追加、Amazonは2023年にFreeveeのFASTチャンネルを75％成長させたい（Lauren Forristal/TechCrunch）。
item.description:
Lauren Forristal / TechCrunch:
Amazon adds 23 FAST channels from WBD and MGM to Freevee, which currently has over 280 channels; Amazon wants to grow Freevee's FAST channels by 75% in 2023  —  Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD) and MGM have reached a deal with Amazon Freevee (formerly IMDb TV) to bring 23 free ad-supported TV …

item.title: ジェフ・ベゾスは2023年にワシントン・ポストの運営により深く関与していると、スタッフが1月にフレッド・ライアンの経営について懸念を示した後に関係者が語っている（New York Times）。
item.description:
New York Times:
Jeff Bezos has been more involved in The Washington Post's operations in 2023, a source says after staff raised concerns in January about Fred Ryan's management  —  Patty Stonesifer, the former chief executive of Martha's Table, will be The Post's interim chief executive.
